summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, forwarding a news article from the Washington Examiner. The article reports on an Epstein accuser's reaction to his death, expressing anger and calling for the prosecution of his accomplices and enablers.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: Recipient of the email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, which forwarded a news article about an Epstein accuser.

events.title: Email Forwarding News Article on Epstein Accuser
events.description: An email is sent from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to Geoffrey Berman, forwarding a Washington Examiner news article about an Epstein accuser's reaction to his death.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
It forwards a Washington Examiner news article about an Epstein accuser's reaction to Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The accuser in the article is described as angry about Epstein's death and wants his accomplices and enablers prosecuted.
The email is addressed to U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman.
The email date is August 10, 2019, shortly after Epstein's death on August 9-10, 2019.
